document.full_text: north korean leader kim jong-il is ready to hold direct talks with south korea but the isolated state will not apologize for two deadly attacks on the divided peninsula last year, former president jimmy carter said on thursday.
document.title: north korean leader ready for talks on any issue: carter
lines_and_colors: north korean leader kim jong-il is ready to hold direct talks with south korea but the isolated state will not apologize for two deadly attacks on the divided peninsula last year, former president jimmy carter said on thursday.
